text: Anne Meara (born September 20, 1929 – May 23, 2015) was an American comedian and actress. She and Jerry Stiller were a 1960s comedy team, appearing as Stiller and Meara, and are the parents of actor/comedian Ben Stiller and actress Amy Stiller. ==Early life== Meara was born in Brooklyn, New York. She is the daughter of Irish immigrant parents, Mary (née Dempsey) and Edward Joseph Meara, a lawyer.Bloom, Nate (March 17, 2009). Interfaith Family.com: "A Pint of Guinness, A Cup of Manischevitz: Some Irish/Jewish Connections".Anne Meara Biography (1929-) Meara was raised in Roman Catholicism, and converted to Reform Judaism six years after marrying Stiller.LA Times ==Death== Meara died on May 23, 2015 at the age of 85 of multiple strokes. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Converts to Judaism Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American comedians Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Anne Meara
